testcase.classname: user could register
testcase.name: new visitors register with valid data
testcase.system-out: Given user goes to register page............................................passed When user chooses a gender "female".........................................passed And user enters full name "Asmaa" and "Rashid"..............................passed And user chooses date of birth.............................................passed And user enters email "nopdemoprojectasmaa@gmail.com".......................passed And user enters company name................................................passed And user enters password "123456" and confirmation "123456".................passed And user clicks on register button..........................................passed Then webapp displays success message........................................passed

testcase.classname: registered user must be able to log in
testcase.name: user logs in with registered email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user goes to log in page..............................................passed When user enters registered email "nopdemoprojectasmaa@gmail.com" and password "123456".passed And user clicks on log in button............................................passed Then user is logged in successfully.........................................passed

testcase.classname: registered user must be able to log in
testcase.name: user log in with invalid account data
testcase.system-out: Given user goes to log in page..............................................passed When user enters invalid email "aaa@aaa.aaa" and password "111111"..........passed And user clicks on log in button............................................passed Then user is not logged in successfully.....................................passed

testcase.classname: registered user must be able to log in
testcase.name: user forgets password
testcase.system-out: Given user goes to log in page..............................................passed And user clicks on forgot password..........................................passed When user enters email for recovery.........................................passed And user clicks on recovery button..........................................passed Then recovery email is sent to the user.....................................passed

testcase.classname: logged user should be able to search for products either by name or SKU

testcase.system-out: When user search for product using name "necklace"..........................passed Then user is directed to right page.........................................passed And all products with the same name should be displayed with the "necklace".passed

testcase.classname: user could select different tags

testcase.system-out: When user selects a category................................................passed When user goes to tags page.................................................passed And user selects a tag......................................................passed Then all products with this tag are displayed...............................passed

testcase.classname: user navigates through home slider
testcase.name: user could navigate through first banner on the slider to specific location

testcase.failure:
